title.narrative: Engage in Fattening and Maize flour Agro-processing

description.narrative:
2019 AP focused on 

1. Mobilizing 5.2m.birr from members through IC to engage in investment. and adopt good financial management in 2 PCs  
2. Backstopping the union to engage in agro-processing of Dairy and fattening project
3.  Boosting output marketing of the union via improving the communication of union and primary coops.

Backstopping the union to engage in agro processing of Dairy and fattening project. Improving the cattle productivity and boosting output marketing of the union via improving the communication of union and primary coops.

Seyemti Adiabo Union is the best on Dairy and Fattening Agro-processing demonstration site in Ethiopia. Seyemti Adiabo Union is located approximately 30 km west of Shire city on the road towards the Eritrea border. The union was initially formed to provide inputs (mainly fertilizer) to its member PCs. However about 4 years ago the union has also started with output marketing in reaction to demands from mainly the individual farmers that were complaining about good markets for their produce. The union has a strong ambition to upscale the output marketing activities and become active in various forms of agro-processing to add value to the member’s products and develop a more sustainable source of income for the union. Furthermore as the area is very suitable for cattle the union would also like to invest in animal fattening. Most farmers of the member PCs of the union are involved in the production of either maize sesame or cattle or a combination of those. The area is also suitable for irrigation farming of the main tomato. The union's fixed assets consist of a warehouse for 3000 quintals of produce a large compound with office and 1 Isuzu truck. The union has recently also bought a mobile trashing machine to provide maize trashing service to the PCs. The union is rather liquid at this moment it has investment capital available of around 6.4 million Birr.

participating-org.narrative: Seyemti Adiabo Multi-Purpose Farmers Cooperative Union

provider-org.narrative: Seyemti Adiabo Multi-Purpose Farmers Cooperative Union
